pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_HEADER
   DIR md4
   OUTPUT_VAR MD4_SOURCES)

pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_HEADER
   DIR md5
   OUTPUT_VAR MD5_SOURCES)

pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_BOTH
   DIR rfc6234
   OUTPUT_VAR RFC6234_SOURCES)

pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_HEADER
   DIR sha1
   OUTPUT_VAR SHA1_SOURCES)

pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_HEADER
   DIR sha3
   OUTPUT_VAR SHA3_SOURCES)

pdk_collect_files(
   TYPE_BOTH
   DIR forkfd
   OUTPUT_VAR FORKFD_SOURCES)

list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${MD4_SOURCES})
list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${MD5_SOURCES})
list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${RFC6234_SOURCES})
list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${SHA1_SOURCES})
list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${SHA3_SOURCES})
list(APPEND PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${FORKFD_SOURCES})

set(PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES ${PDK_THIRDPARTY_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
